title: [Bloomberg] In-Office & Virtual Recruitment Information Sessions
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Subject: Bloomberg In-Office & Virtual Recruitment Information Sessions

Hi,

We are very excited to share that the Bloomberg Hong Kong team will be recruiting in Seoul this year! We'd like to invite you to join our Recruitment Information Virtual Session to learn more about our company and businesses, our culture, and our 2025 graduate and summer internship opportunities in Hong Kong. You will get to ask questions directly to and network with our Early Careers Recruiters and Business Representatives.

What's it it for you?
For those who attended this virtual session, you will receive an exclusive invitation to attend an in-person Terminal Training Workshop and Networking Event in our Seoul office in the first week of September. We will also be giving out free logins to Bloomberg Market Concepts online course (self-paced, e-learning course that provides an interactive introduction to the financial markets using the power of the Bloomberg Terminal).

Event Details
Date: 20 August 2024 (Tue)
Time: 11am-12pm KST
Language: Korean & English
Registration: https://tinyurl.com/28lmgxkd
Deadline: 16 August 2024

Agenda:
Company Introduction
Department Overview - Analytics & Sales
Graduate and Internship Opportunities in Hong Kong
Q&A

For more information about opportunities at Bloomberg, please visit our careers website - www.bloomberg.com/careers.

We look forward to meeting you!

Bloomberg Early Careers Recruitment Team
